name: P.L.A.N.T.D.S.C
description:
Pirate Lasering And Nullifying Terminators Dubbed: Starblight Couriers (P.L.A.N.T.D.S.C).

Made for GMJAM 10

WASD = Pitch and roll

Quick Tap W or S: Throttle

Quick Tap A or D: Yaw a little

L Shift = Target

SPACE = Fire (when locked on)

You can invert flight controls in settings

Incomplete but playable game submitted for GBJAM 10

Bask thyself into a game with a bug where >4 colors are present :( , the window is way too small, and the game crashes when you die. Fun stuff...  (EDIT: these have been fixed in V2, woo!)

A little hint, don't be too comfortable when there's a decrease in enemy spawn rate ;)

This game has a complex wave system that should loop endlessly.

This is my first game jam, and lessons learned were:

  • Build and test games early
  • Art, sound, assets, etc, should come early on
  • Avoid diving into new things or be prepared to spend allot of time (half of the game jam for me - GBCamera was a bit of a pain...)
  • Playtest!!
  • Avoid scope creep - the original plan for this game was to have at least a missile weapon, a FTL cutscene, and 4 menus that supported trading plants. Obviously I had to cut these down or I wouldn't have much of a game at all.
  • INCLUDE SHADERS YOU INTEND TO USE IN GRAPHICS -> "Always Included Shaders" (this fixed the > 4 colors bug).

Hopefully in a future game jam I'll do a remake...
